virtual AkUInt32 AK::IAkGameObjectPluginInfo::GetNumEmitterListenerPairs (  )  const [pure virtual, inherited]

Retrieve the number of emitter-listener pairs (rays) of the game object. A game object may have more than one position, and be listened to more than one listener. The returned value is the product of these two numbers. Use the returned value as a higher bound for the index of GetEmitterListenerPair(). Note that rays whose listener is irrelevant to the current context are ignored. For example, if the calling plugin exists on a bus, only listeners that are routed to the end point's device are considered.

See also:
  • AK::SoundEngine::SetPosition()
  • AK::SoundEngine::SetMultiplePositions()
  • AK::SoundEngine::SetListenerPosition()
  • AK::SoundEngine::SetActiveListeners()
  • AK::IAkGameObjectPluginInfo::GetEmitterListenerPair()
  • AK::SoundEngine::AddSecondaryOutput()
